mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ants_goods_base (goodsId,goodsName,goodsDescribe, goodsPicture,goodsClass,goodsPrice, goodsState,goodsBargin,goodsBelong, goodsWay,uploadTime,repertory) VALUES (#{goodsId},#{goodsName},#{goodsDescribe}, #{goodsPicture},#{goodsClass},#{goodsPrice}, #{goodsState},#{goodsBargin},#{goodsBelong}, #{goodsWay},#{uploadTime},#{repertory})
